name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Paris' Arrow Facebook Admin Post Reporter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Efficiently report posts to administrators on Facebook, akin to Paris' arrow striking Achilles' heel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Paris' Arrow Facebook Admin Post Reporter

Streamline your Facebook group moderation with Paris' Arrow, an efficient tool for reporting posts to group admins. This extension automates the process of scrolling through your Facebook feed and reporting posts that may require admin attention.

Key Features:
• Automatic scrolling through Facebook posts
• One-click reporting to group admins
• Simple start/stop functionality
• Works with Facebook's English interface

Perfect for:
• Group moderators managing high-volume feeds
• Community managers looking to maintain group quality
• Users wanting to quickly report multiple posts for admin review

How it works:
1. Click "Start Shooting" to begin the process
2. The extension scrolls through posts, reporting each to group admins
3. Click "Stop Shooting" at any time to halt the process

Note: This extension is designed for use with Facebook in English. It may not function correctly with other language settings.

Disclaimer: Use this tool responsibly and in accordance with Facebook's Terms of Service. This extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by Facebook. Always review and confirm each report before submission to ensure accuracy and prevent misuse.

Enhance your Facebook group management experience with Paris' Arrow – your swift and accurate reporting companion.
